original_description: Log Rides and Runs to a Day One entry with detailed info, and link. (no Photo)

trigger_details.title:
Created at
Date and time the activity was completed.
trigger_details.description: Date and time the activity was completed.

trigger_details.title:
Activity type
The type of activity completed.

Name
The name of the activity.

Distance meters
Distance moved in meters.

Elapsed time
Total duration of the activity.

Elapsed time in seconds
Total duration of the activity in seconds.
trigger_details.description: Total duration of the activity in seconds.

trigger_details.title:
Link to activity
The URL to the activity on Strava.
trigger_details.description: The URL to the activity on Strava.

trigger_details.title:
Route map image url
URL to a map image of the route.
trigger_details.description: URL to a map image of the route.

details.Label: Which Journal?
details.Helper text: Select a specific Journal. New Journals must be created in the Day One app.

details.Label: Body
details.Helper text: Add plain text and Markdown, HTML will be stripped.

details.Label: Latitude
details.Helper text: The latitude of the entry location.

details.Label: Longitude
details.Helper text: The longitude of the entry location.

details.Label: Place Name
details.Helper text: The name of the entry location.

original_description:
Automatically save your Instagram photos to Day One. 
Note: This currently only works with single-photo Instagram posts.

trigger_details.title:
Url
The short URL to the photo's Instagram page.
trigger_details.description: The short URL to the photo's Instagram page.

trigger_details.title:
Source url
URL to the image file.

Created at
Date and time the photo was taken.
trigger_details.description: Date and time the photo was taken.

trigger_details.title:
Embed code
The HTML embed code for the photo.
trigger_details.description: The HTML embed code for the photo.

details.Example: <iframe src="http://instagr.am/p/CTGBw/embed" width="612" height="710" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>

intent: : Automate the saving of Instagram photos to Day One journal.
